we started from day one in aws

it was very important for us to be able
to scale up

we process huge amount of data every

above 800 terabytes in s3
so

to be able to grow and shrink if needed
on a daily basis we were able to

we use sqs scs sns
we use simple workflows
all these allow us to build new features
